pullRequest.title: [WFLY-13226]: Upgrade Apache Artemis to 2.16.0
pullRequest.bodyText:
Upgrading Apache Artemis version to 2.16.0
journal now needs to be able to load json.
Adding support for the SSLProviderFactory
Fixing change in BroadcastGroupControlHandler due to ARTEMIS-2749.

Jira: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFLY-13226

nodes.bodyText: This is not needed as the AttributeDefinition has default value ModelNode.TRUE.

Do you want all the whitespace change here?
I guess it's ok but maybe in a separate commit?
